EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Call Follow Up (1335967546.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Call Follow Up (1335967546.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Josh, Sounds good – most people go to their local banks for the notary aspect. We can’t active the account until we have the SOW and I-9. Once we do, I will activate the account and walk you through the process. MBO will work with you on your benefits; we take one month’s deposit for gaps in work (as this is typical in the consulting world.) I would say you could go 1-2 months without work but we will always work with you and will not cancel and benefits without giving you a warning so you have time to prepare. I will discuss this at length when we do our “welcome call” and go through the system. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Joshua Greenberg [mailto:joshua@crmventures.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2012 9:18 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Hey Sara, I need to find a notary for the I9 but otherwise we should be good to go. Can I start entering time and expenses into the system? Also, how long can I go without billings before MBO drops my W2 (and life ins, 401k and such). I don't anticipate any lags, but between engagements there could be bench time.
On Monday, April 30, 2012, Sara Conde wrote:Hi Josh, Good question, but unfortunately the fee is non-negotiable. If there is any range in our fee that you found online it is probably from our Enterprise clients – we sometimes offer a program discount if they are funneling people to us. Thanks, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5KvVJ3y%2F%2BLL7%2FokSHVaJ279b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5KvVJ3y%2F%2BLL7%2FokSHVaJ279b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify From: Joshua Greenberg [mailto:joshua@crmventures.com <javascript:_e(%7b%7d,%20>] Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 11:17 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up
Awesome, will speak to you then. One thing to consider before we speak is the fee. Is there flexibility? What if I pay upfront or have additional folks sign-up? In my research online, it appears that MBO does charge a range (I found between 3.5 - 5%) and that some competitors rates are on the lower end of that range.
Thanks, Josh On Mon, Apr 30, 2012 at 11:11 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5KvVJ3y%2F%2BLL7%2FokSHVaJ279b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> wrote: Hi Josh,
I am so thrilled to hear that. Yes, feel free to give me a call at 6pm I will block off the time.
Looking forward to connecting with you!
Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
